condition.description: Conditions check situations and activate triggers if met.

effect.description: Effects are actions that are executed when a trigger is activated.

trigger.description: Triggers are used to activate effects

selector.description: Selectors are used to select users or furniture for a trigger or effect.

variable.description: Variables are used to store information that can be used in triggers and effects.

addon.description: Add-Ons are used to add additional functionality to triggers and effects.

move_rotate.name: WIRED Effect: Move And Rotate Furni
move_rotate.description: Moves and rotates the selected Furni, adjusting its position and orientation in the room as specified.

time_more_than.name: WIRED Condition: More Than x Secs Elapsed Since Timer Reset
time_more_than.description: Allows triggering if more than x seconds have passed since the timer was reset.

state_changed.name: WIRED Trigger: Furni Is Used
state_changed.description: Activates effects when the state of a Furni changes, such as when it's double-clicked.

periodically.name: WIRED Trigger: Repeat Effect
periodically.description: Triggers effects at regular intervals of x seconds.

score_achieved.name: WIRED Trigger: Score Is Achieved
score_achieved.description: Activates effects when a team reaches a specified score in a game.

teleport_to.name: WIRED Effect: Teleport To Furni
teleport_to.description: Teleports the triggering user to a selected Furni. If multiple Furni are selected, the user is teleported to one randomly.

says_something.name: WIRED Trigger: User Says Keyword
says_something.description: Activates effects when a user says a specific word or phrase.

walks_off_furni.name: WIRED Trigger: User Walks Off Furni
walks_off_furni.description: Triggers effects when a user steps off a selected Furni.

at_given_time.name: WIRED Trigger: At Set Time
at_given_time.description: Triggers effects at a specified time after the timer is reset.

game_ends.name: WIRED Trigger: Game Ends
game_ends.description: Activates effects when a game in the room ends.

show_message.name: WIRED Effect: Show Message
show_message.description: Displays a secret message to the triggering users.

time_less_than.name: WIRED Condition: Less Than x Secs Elapsed Since Timer Reset
time_less_than.description: Allows triggering if less than x seconds have passed since the timer was reset.

enter_room.name: WIRED Trigger: User Enters Room
enter_room.description: Activates effects when a user enters the room.

toggle_state.name: WIRED Effect: Toggle Furni State
toggle_state.description: Changes the state of a selected Furni as if it was double-clicked.

reset_timers.name: WIRED Effect: Timer Reset
reset_timers.description: Resets timers used by triggers such as 'WIRED Trigger: At Set Time' and 'WIRED Trigger: Repeat Effect'.

furnis_hv_avtrs.name: WIRED Condition: Furni Has Users
furnis_hv_avtrs.description: Allows triggering if all selected Furni have users on them.

trggrer_on_frn.name: WIRED Condition: Triggering User Is On Furni
trggrer_on_frn.description: Allows triggering if the triggering user is on one of the selected Furni.

match_snapshot.name: WIRED Condition: Furni States And Positions Match
match_snapshot.description: Allows triggering if the states and positions of the selected Furni match a predefined setup.

give_score.name: WIRED Effect: Give Points
give_score.description: Awards a set number of points to the team that triggers the effect. You can also limit how many times this effect can be triggered during a game.

match_to_sshot.name: WIRED Effect: Match Furni to Position & State
match_to_sshot.description: Resets the selected Furni to its predefined position and state.

game_starts.name: WIRED Trigger: Game Starts
game_starts.description: Activates effects when a game starts in the room.

walks_on_furni.name: WIRED Trigger: User Walks On Furni
walks_on_furni.description: Triggers effects when a user steps or sits on a selected Furni.

has_furni_on.name: WIRED Condition: Has Furni On
has_furni_on.description: Allows triggering if one of the selected Furni has another Furni placed on top of it.

actor_in_group.name: WIRED Condition: Group Member
actor_in_group.description: Allows triggering if the triggering user is a member of the room's group.

give_reward.name: WIRED Effect: Give Reward
give_reward.description: Awards a reward to the triggering user or team based on predefined criteria.

call_stacks.name: WIRED Effect: Execute Wired Stacks
call_stacks.description: Executes up to 5 wired stacks from a single trigger, regardless of other conditions or triggers.

kick_user.name: WIRED Effect: Kick User
kick_user.description: Kicks the triggering user from the room based on the defined criteria.

period_long.name: WIRED Trigger: Periodically Long
period_long.description: Triggers effects at longer intervals than standard periodical triggers, ideal for extended games.

give_score_tm.name: WIRED Effect: Give Score to a Predefined Team
give_score_tm.description: Awards a set number of points to a specific team. You can also limit how many times this score can be awarded during a game.

move_to_dir.name: WIRED Effect: Change Furni Direction
move_to_dir.description: Changes the direction of the selected Furni. If movement is blocked, the Furni will change direction according to the settings. If there is a user nearby, 'WIRED Trigger: User Stuff Collision' will be triggered.

leave_team.name: WIRED Effect: Leave Team
leave_team.description: Makes the triggering user leave their current team.

collision.name: WIRED Trigger: User Stuff Collision
collision.description: Triggers effects when there is a collision between a user and a Furni, detected by movement effects.

chase.name: WIRED Effect: Move Furni Towards Nearest User
chase.description: Moves the selected Furni towards the nearest user in the same row or column. If there is a user nearby, 'WIRED Trigger: User Stuff Collision' will be triggered.

actor_in_team.name: WIRED Condition: User Is On Team x
actor_in_team.description: Allows triggering if the triggering user is a member of the specified team.

flee.name: WIRED Effect: Move Furni Away from Nearest User
flee.description: Moves the selected Furni away from the nearest user in the same row or column. If there is a user nearby, 'WIRED Trigger: User Stuff Collision' will be triggered.

join_team.name: WIRED Effect: Join Team
join_team.description: Makes the triggering user join a specified team.

wearing_badge.name: WIRED Condition: Wearing Badge
wearing_badge.description: Allows triggering if the user is wearing a specific badge.

wearing_effect.name: WIRED Condition: Wearing Avatar Effect
wearing_effect.description: Allows triggering if the user is under a specific avatar effect.

not_trggrer_on.name: WIRED Negative Condition: Triggerer Is NOT on Furni
not_trggrer_on.description: Allows triggering if the triggering user is not on any of the selected Furni.

not_in_team.name: WIRED Negative Condition: NOT Team Member
not_in_team.description: Allows triggering if the triggering user is not a member of the specified team.

not_furni_on.name: WIRED Negative Condition: Has NO Furni On
not_furni_on.description: Allows triggering if none of the selected Furni have another Furni placed on them.

not_hv_avtrs.name: WIRED Negative Condition: Furni Have NO Avatars
not_hv_avtrs.description: Allows triggering if none of the selected Furni have avatars on them.

at_time_long.name: WIRED Trigger: At Set Time (Long)
at_time_long.description: Triggers effects at a longer interval after the timer is reset.

not_user_count.name: WIRED Condition: User DOESN'T Count in Room
not_user_count.description: Allows triggering if the user count in the room is not within the defined limits.

not_wearing_fx.name: WIRED Negative Condition: NOT Wearing Avatar Effect
not_wearing_fx.description: Allows triggering if the user is not under a specific avatar effect.

user_count_in.name: WIRED Condition: User Count in Room
user_count_in.description: Allows triggering if the user count in the room is within the defined limits.

not_wearing_b.name: WIRED Negative Condition: NOT Wearing Badge
not_wearing_b.description: Allows triggering if the user is not wearing a specified badge.

stuff_is.name: WIRED Condition: Furni Matches
stuff_is.description: Allows triggering if the Furni defined by the trigger matches one of the selected Furni or is of the same type.

not_in_group.name: WIRED Negative Condition: NOT Group Member
not_in_group.description: Allows triggering if the user is in a group room but is not a member of that group.

not_stuff_is.name: WIRED Negative Condition: Furni DOESN'T Match
not_stuff_is.description: Allows triggering if the Furni defined by the trigger does not match any of the selected Furni or is not of the same type.

move_furni_to.name: WIRED Effect: Move Triggering Furni
move_furni_to.description: Moves the triggering Furni to the vicinity of one of the selected Furni.

toggle_to_rnd.name: WIRED Effect: Toggle Furni to Random State
toggle_to_rnd.description: Changes the state of the selected Furni to a random state.

not_match_snap.name: WIRED Negative Condition: Furni States DON'T Match
not_match_snap.description: Allows triggering if the states of the selected Furni do not match.

mute_triggerer.name: WIRED Effect: Mute User
mute_triggerer.description: Mutes the triggering user, preventing them from speaking in the room.

date_rng_active.name: WIRED Condition: Date and Time
date_rng_active.description: Allows setting a specific date and time range during which the wired effect can be triggered.

bot_clothes.name: WIRED Effect: Bot Changes Clothes
bot_clothes.description: Changes the clothes of the selected Bot.

bot_teleport.name: WIRED Effect: Teleport Bot to Furni
bot_teleport.description: Teleports the selected Bot to one of the chosen Furni.

bot_reached_stf.name: WIRED Trigger: Bot Reaches Furni
bot_reached_stf.description: Triggers effects when the selected Bot reaches one of the chosen Furni.

bot_follow_avatar.name: WIRED Effect: Bot Follows User
bot_follow_avatar.description: Makes the selected Bot follow the triggering user.

bot_give_handitem.name: WIRED Effect: Give Handitem
bot_give_handitem.description: Makes the selected Bot give the specified handitem to a user.

bot_move.name: WIRED Effect: Bot Moves to Furni
bot_move.description: Moves the selected Bot to one of the chosen Furni.

has_handitem.name: WIRED Condition: User Has Handitem
has_handitem.description: Allows triggering if the user is holding the specified handitem.

bot_talk_to_avatar.name: WIRED Effect: Bot Talks or Whispers to User
bot_talk_to_avatar.description: Makes the selected Bot talk or whisper to the triggering user.

bot_reached_avtr.name: WIRED Trigger: Bot Reaches User
bot_reached_avtr.description: Triggers effects when the selected Bot reaches a user.

bot_talk.name: WIRED Effect: Bot Talks to All Users
bot_talk.description: Makes the selected Bot talk or shout to all users in the room.

clock_counter.name: WIRED Trigger: Counter Reaches Set Time
clock_counter.description: Activates effects when a counter reaches a predefined time.

control_clock.name: WIRED Effect: Control Counter
control_clock.description: Starts, stops, or resets a counter in the room.

not_user_performs_action.name: WIRED Negative Condition: User Is NOT Performing Action
not_user_performs_action.description: Allows triggering if the user is not performing a specific action.

match_date.name: WIRED Condition: Date Matches
match_date.description: Allows triggering if the current date matches a specified date.

match_time.name: WIRED Condition: Time Matches
match_time.description: Allows triggering if the current time matches a specified time.

triggerer_match.name: WIRED Condition: Triggerer Matches
triggerer_match.description: Allows triggering if the triggering user matches specific criteria.

not_has_handitem.name: WIRED Negative Condition: User DOESN'T Have Handitem
not_has_handitem.description: Allows triggering if the user is not holding the specified handitem.

user_performs_action.name: WIRED Trigger: User Is Performing Action
user_performs_action.description: Activates effects when the user performs a specific action.

not_triggerer_match.name: WIRED Negative Condition: Triggerer DOESN'T Match
not_triggerer_match.description: Allows triggering if the triggering user does not match specific criteria.

counter_time_matches.name: WIRED Condition: Counter Time Matches
counter_time_matches.description: Allows triggering if a counter's time matches a specified value.

team_has_rank.name: WIRED Condition: Team Is Winning
team_has_rank.description: Allows triggering if a specific team is currently leading in points.

team_has_score.name: WIRED Condition: Team Has Score
team_has_score.description: Allows triggering if a team has reached a predefined score.

send_signal.name: WIRED Effect: Send Signal
send_signal.description: Sends a signal that can trigger other wired effects or conditions.

click_furni.name: WIRED Trigger: User Clicks Furni
click_furni.description: Activates effects when a user clicks on a specified piece of furniture.

recv_signal.name: WIRED Trigger: Receive Signal
recv_signal.description: Activates effects when a predefined signal is received.

stuff_state.name: WIRED Trigger: Furni State Is Changed
stuff_state.description: Triggers effects when the state of a specified piece of furniture changes.

set_altitude.name: WIRED Effect: Set Furni Altitude
set_altitude.description: Changes the altitude of a selected piece of furniture, raising or lowering it.

has_altitude.name: WIRED Condition: Furni Altitude Matches
has_altitude.description: Allows triggering if the selected Furni is at a specific altitude.

freeze.name: WIRED Effect: Freeze User
freeze.description: Temporarily prevents a user from moving, effectively freezing them in place.

rel_mov.name: WIRED Effect: Relative Furni Movement
rel_mov.description: Moves furniture relative to its current position rather than to a specific location.

period_short.name: WIRED Trigger: Repeat Effect (Short)
period_short.description: Activates effects at shorter intervals than the standard periodical trigger.

actor_dir.name: WIRED Condition: User Direction
actor_dir.description: Allows triggering if the user is facing a specified direction.

unfreeze.name: WIRED Effect: Unfreeze User
unfreeze.description: Reverses the freeze effect, allowing a previously frozen user to move again.

users_area.name: WIRED Selector: Users In Area
users_area.description: Selects users within a specified area for targeted effects.

furni_signal.name: WIRED Selector: Furni From Signal
furni_signal.description: Selects furniture that has received a specific signal.

users_byname.name: WIRED Selector: Users By Name
users_byname.description: Targets users by their specific names for personalized interactions.

furni_to_furni.name: WIRED Effect: Move Furni To Furni
furni_to_furni.description: Moves a piece of furniture to the location of another selected piece.

furni_onfurni.name: WIRED Selector: Furni On Furni
furni_onfurni.description: Identifies furniture placed on top of another piece.

furni_altitude.name: WIRED Selector: Furni With Altitude
furni_altitude.description: Selects furniture based on its altitude.

users_group.name: WIRED Selector: Users In Group
users_group.description: Targets users who are members of a specified group.

furni_area.name: WIRED Selector: Furni In Area
furni_area.description: Selects furniture within a predefined area.

furni_bytype.name: WIRED Selector: Furni By Type
furni_bytype.description: Targets furniture of a specific type.

slc_quantity.name: WIRED Condition: Selector Quantity
slc_quantity.description: Checks if the number of selected items meets a certain condition.

valid_moves.name: WIRED Condition: Valid Moves
valid_moves.description: Allows triggering if the intended furniture movement is valid and unobstructed.

users_handitem.name: WIRED Selector: Users With Handitem
users_handitem.description: Targets users holding a specific handitem.

furni_picks.name: WIRED Selector: Furni Picks
furni_picks.description: Allows for the selection of furniture based on specific criteria.

users_signal.name: WIRED Selector: Users From Signal
users_signal.description: Targets users based on a received signal.

users_byaction.name: WIRED Selector: Users By Action
users_byaction.description: Selects users based on their actions, such as walking or speaking.

furni_to_user.name: WIRED Effect: Move Furni To User
furni_to_user.description: Moves a piece of furniture to a user's location.

users_onfurni.name: WIRED Selector: Users On Furni
users_onfurni.description: Identifies users who are on a piece of furniture.

furni_neighborhood.name: WIRED Selector: Furni In Neighborhood
furni_neighborhood.description: Selects furniture within a certain proximity.

users_bytype.name: WIRED Selector: Users By Type
users_bytype.description: Targets users based on a type or classification.

users_team.name: WIRED Selector: Users In Team
users_team.description: Targets users who are part of a specified team.

users_neighborhood.name: WIRED Selector: Users In Neighborhood
users_neighborhood.description: Selects users within a certain area or proximity.

furni_with_var.name: WIRED Selector: Furni With Variable
furni_with_var.description: Selects furniture items that have a specific variable assigned.

var_changed.name: WIRED Trigger: Variable Changed
var_changed.description: Activates effects when the configured variable is changed.

filter_furni_by_var.name: WIRED Filter: Furni With Highest/Lowest Variable
filter_furni_by_var.description: Filters furniture to those with the highest or lowest values of a specific variable.

var_val_match.name: WIRED Condition: Variable Value
var_val_match.description: Allows triggering if a variable matches a specified value.

leave_room.name: WIRED Trigger: User Leaves Room
leave_room.description: Activates effects when a user leaves the room.

change_var_val.name: WIRED Effect: Change Variable Value
change_var_val.description: Changes the value of a variable by setting, adding, or subtracting.

filter_users_by_var.name: WIRED Filter: Users With Highest/Lowest Variable
filter_users_by_var.description: Filters users to those with the highest or lowest values of a specific variable.

var_text_connector.name: Variable Add-on: Text Connector
var_text_connector.description: Allows combining text with variable values for messages.

var_age_match.name: WIRED Condition: Variable Age
var_age_match.description: Allows triggering if a variable was last changed within a specific time frame.

text_output_variable.name: WIRED Text Add-on: Variable Placeholder
text_output_variable.description: Displays variable values within text messages to users.

give_var.name: WIRED Effect: Give Variable
give_var.description: Assigns a variable to a user or Furni.

move_rotate_user.name: WIRED Effect: Move and Rotate User
move_rotate_user.description: Moves and rotates the triggering user to a specified location and direction.

remove_var.name: WIRED Effect: Remove Variable
remove_var.description: Removes a variable from a user or Furni.

user_to_furni.name: WIRED Effect: Move User To Furni
user_to_furni.description: Moves the triggering user to the location of a selected Furni.

text_output_username.name: WIRED Text Add-on: Username Placeholder
text_output_username.description: Allows insertion of the triggering user's name into text messages.

remote.name: WIRED Selector: Remote Selection
remote.description: Selects items or users from another room or location.

neg_has_var.name: WIRED Negative Condition: Doesn't Have Variable
neg_has_var.description: Allows triggering if the user or Furni does not have a specific variable.

text_input_variable.name: WIRED Text Add-on: Variable Capturer
text_input_variable.description: Captures user input as text and stores it in a variable.

users_with_var.name: WIRED Selector: Users With Variable
users_with_var.description: Selects users who have a specific variable assigned.

has_var.name: WIRED Condition: Has Variable
has_var.description: Allows triggering if the user or Furni has a specific variable.

exec_in_order.name: WIRED Add-on: Execute Effect In Order
exec_in_order.description: Executes effects in a specific order.

random.name: WIRED Add-on: Random Effect
random.description: Only one random effect in this stack is triggered at a time.

unseen.name: WIRED Add-on: Unseen Effect
unseen.description: Only one previously unused effect in this stack is triggered at a time.

or_eval.name: WIRED Add-on: At Least One Condition Is True
or_eval.description: Allows effects to trigger if any one condition in the stack is met.

mov_physics.name: WIRED Add-on: Movement Physics
mov_physics.description: Applies physics to furniture movement, making it respond realistically to obstacles.

mov_no_animation.name: WIRED Add-on: Cancel Move Animation
mov_no_animation.description: Moves furniture instantly without the moving animation.

mov_carry_users.name: WIRED Add-on: Carry Users
mov_carry_users.description: Carries users standing on moving furniture along with it.

execution_limit.name: WIRED Add-on: Execution Limit
execution_limit.description: Limits the number of times an effect can be executed.

anim_time.name: WIRED Add-On: Animation Time
anim_time.description: Customizes the transition time from one position to another.

filter_users.name: WIRED Filter: Filter To X Users
filter_users.description: Filters the selected users down to a specific number.

filter_furni.name: WIRED Filter: Filter To X Furni
filter_furni.description: Filters the selected Furni down to a specific number.

context.name: WIRED Variable: Context Variable
context.description: Stores temporary information used within the current wired interaction.

user.name: WIRED Variable: User Variable
user.description: Stores variables assigned to specific users.

furni.name: WIRED Variable: Furni Variable
furni.description: Stores variables assigned to specific furniture items.

reference.name: WIRED Variable: From Another Room
reference.description: Allows access to variables shared from another room.

room.name: WIRED Variable: Global Variable
room.description: Stores variables shared across the entire room.

click_tile.name: WIRED Trigger: User Clicks Tile
click_tile.description: Activates effects when a user clicks on a floor tile.

neg_send_signal.name: WIRED Negative Effect: Send Signal
neg_send_signal.description: Sends a negative signal to cancel or negate previous signals.

neg_call_stacks.name: WIRED Negative Effect: Execute Stacks
neg_call_stacks.description: Executes negative wired stacks to reverse effects.
